title: Docs/Website: Use contents of index*.yaml instead of guide*.yaml

labels.name: area/infra-automation
labels.description: anything related to CI, bots, etc. that are used to automated our infrastructure

body:
- Requires #28483
- Spans this repo and [quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io)

`docs` module quarkus project now creates two index files (one by name, and one by "type"). 

This includes the summary attribute that should be used when rendering tiles on the website. Related to adoption of quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io#1458

- Ensure rsync copies index*.yaml to the right locations
- Update jekyll to choose layout based on presence of index*.yaml file (avoid disruption for earlier releases in docs)

- [x] https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/29022
- [x] https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/pull/1566
